com.google.inject.osgi
Annotation Type OSGiService

@Target(value={TYPE,FIELD,PARAMETER})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface OSGiService

Annotates members of your implementation class (constructors, methods and fields) where the Injector should either inject an OSGi service proxy, or a ServiceTrackerCustomizer implementation, backed by a ServiceTracker. 

     @Inject
     @OSGiService
     MyService zeroToOne;
 
     @Inject
     @OSGiService
     Iterable<MyService> zeroToMany;
 
     @Inject
     @OSGiService(mandatory = true)
     MyService oneToOne;
 
     @Inject
     @OSGiService(mandatory = true)
     Iterable<MyService> oneToMany;
 
     @Inject
     @OSGiService(dynamic = false)
     MyService fixedAtStartup;
 
     @Inject
     @OSGiService("(code=simple)")
     MyService ldapFiltering;
 
     @Inject
     @OSGiService(interfaces = {MySpecialisedService.class})
     MyService customInterface;
 
     @Inject
     @OSGiService(interfaces = MyService.class)
     MyServiceTrackerCustomizer listener;

Author:
stuart.mcculloch@jayway.net (Stuart McCulloch)
